headline: 3 Reasons LKQ is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Shareholders of LKQ would probably like to forget the past six months even happened. The stock dropped 25.4% and now trades at $31.49. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.
